title: Wellness and Complementary Medicine
description: Complementary Medicine includes chiropractic care, Tai Chi for arthritis, massage therapy, nutrition counseling, hand therapy, occupational therapy, and acupuncture. Learn more about these complementary services
cleaned_text: Complementary Medicine at Summit Health provides [chiropractic care](/services/chiropractic-medicine), Tai Chi for arthritis through our acupuncturist, [nutrition counseling](/services/nutrition-services), [hand therapy](/services/hand-therapy), occupational therapy, and [acupuncture](/services/acupuncture) for patients with chronic disease as well as those who wish to focus on wellness and prevention. Alternative Medicine or Integrative Medicine? Complementary medicine is sometimes called alternative medicine or integrative medicine, but alternative and integrative medicine are not the same. Alternative medicine involves health and wellness treatments that do not include conventional medicine techniques such as surgery and pharmaceutical drugs. Complementary medicine or integrative medicine combine conventional medicine with alternative medicine. Our health care professionals at Summit Health partner with physicians in [internal medicine](/services/internal-medicine) to identify complementary therapies that can improve your overall health and well-being. A Focus on Wellness Our skilled staff thoughtfully considers all your health and wellness concerns to care for you as a whole person. This includes treatment for acute illnesses and injuries as well as health maintenance therapies and treatments that promote ongoing wellness. Our Wellness and Complementary Medicine Providers [View Our Specialists](https://www.summithealth.com/doctors?query=&facetFilters=%7B%22c_locationFilter%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22c_summitHealthSpecialties%22%3A%5B%7B%22c_summitHealthSpecialties%22%3A%7B%22%24eq%22%3A%22Wellness%20and%20Complementary%20Medicine%22%7D%7D%5D%2C%22gender%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22c_sHAcceptingPatientsFacet%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22languages%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22c_credentialsList%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22c_clinicalExpertise%22%3A%5B%5D%7D&filters=%7B%7D&referrerPageUrl=https%3A//www.summithealth.com/doctors/nosakhare-tongo-md) Our Services Our complementary medicine services include but are not limited to: [Chiropractic Care](/services/chiropractic-medicine) - a noninvasive, manual therapy that adjusts the musculoskeletal system to realign the skeleton (especially the spine) to reduce both acute and chronic pain and promote proper functioning of the body. [Nutrition Services](/services/nutrition-services) - healthy diet recommendations from our nutritionists to lose weight, eat well during pregnancy, and/or promote wellness. [Hand Therapy](/services/hand-therapy) - techniques that give you the opportunity to restore the use of your hand(s) after an upper extremity injury, surgery, or a disease that affects hand function.
